space_and_layout.description: Max number of guests allowed based on total floor area. Affects ticket/entry capacity and sales potential. (floorArea / 1.2)
Scales monthly rent cost relative to baseline venue rent.
Scales cleaning/maintenance expenses per event or per day.
Boosts or penalizes overall sound quality score; influenced by ceiling height and room shape.
Affects how long guests stay before leaving; modifies drink sales and crowd happiness.
Penalty applied to bar sales if floor plan is too complex; ranges 0.0 to -0.15.
Extra upkeep for more rooms/partitions; affects daily overhead.

show_infrastructure.description: Highest tier of band/artist you can book; scales with stage size and backstage space.
Multiplier on artist booking fees. High backstage quality and stage size reduce cost.
Base rating for concert quality; affects reviews and repeat business.
Direct multiplier to ticket demand based on lighting, acoustics, and aesthetics.
Relative chance of noise complaints and fines. Lower sound isolation increases this risk.
Chance of being forced to shut down early; lowered by compliance upgrades.
Represents ability to handle electrical demand. < 1.0 restricts band equipment usage.

comfort_and_guest_experience.description: Average time a guest stays. Higher means more drinks sold.
Overall boost or penalty to attendance based on climate control and comfort.
Average spend per guest on drinks. More bars or better comfort increase this.
Represents queue length impact. < 1.0 means shorter waits, happier guests.
Aggregated rating from guests; affects reputation and repeat visitors.
Scaling factor for attendance of older demographics; depends on seating availability.
Boosts appeal for younger, energetic crowds if seating is low.
Base attractiveness score; affects organic demand, influencer interest, and reviews.

safety_and_compliance.description: Hard cap multiplier based on fire exits; restricts usable maxCapacity.
Likelihood of forced closure events. Lower with more exits & compliance upgrades.
Scales cost of venue insurance policy.
Chance of surprise inspections or penalties per month.
Fraction of ideal operating hours allowed by curfew/zoning.
Overall sales capacity relative to a 24/7 ideal venue.

support_and_backstage.description: Improves chances of booking bigger acts or discounts on fees.
Direct multiplier for band/artist fees based on backstage & hospitality.
Similar to bandTierCap but influenced by backstage size and amenities.
Additional revenue multiplier if kitchen/storage space is available.
Lower means cheaper supply restocking and smoother operations.

external_and_access.description: Extra attendance based on parking availability.
Extra capacity unlocked by outdoor space during warm months.
If true, allows matinee or day events on weekends.
Multiplier for random passersby converting into paying guests.

additional_variables.description: Global 0â€“100 score that grows with good events and drops with bad reviews.
Multiplier that increases ticket sales after great events or influencer visits.
Track guest movement patterns to detect chokepoints and optimize layout.
Temporary multiplier for ticket demand when marketing campaigns run.
